thread.title: Two students die after falling off suburban train in Chennai
thread.title_full: Two students die after falling off suburban train in Chennai

title: Two students die after falling off suburban train in Chennai
text: Two students die after falling off suburban train in Chennai Two students die after falling off suburban train in Chennai Siddharth Prabhakar Two students died and five others suffered serious injuries when they fell off a suburban train in Chennai on Thursday morning. | TNN | Updated: Feb 23, 2017, 10.25 AM IST (Representative image) CHENNAI: Two students died and five others suffered serious injuries when they fell off a suburban train in Chennai on Thursday morning. The students were standing on the footboard of a Tirumalpur -Chennai Beach suburban train when the bag of one of the victims was caught in a signal post between Palavanthangal and St Thomas Mount railway stations, dragging him down, according to a Railway Protection Force officer. Six others who stood near him lost balance and fell down. The accident happened around 9.15am. The deceased and the injured were students. It was not known where they were studying.
